tasks.task: Enroll in the course on fundamentals of agricultural extension.
subtasks: Visit AGMOOC's platform.
Familiarize with the course offered by Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur.
Understand collaboration with Commonwealth of Learning Vancouver Canada.
Register as an undergraduate or postgraduate student.
Consider professional background in agriculture or allied disciplines.
Prepare for the course as a development perspectives student.
Attend lectures about agricultural extension concepts.
Participate in quizzes after each two weeks.
Complete an assignment at the end of eight weeks.
Aim for excellence in examination and attendance.
Receive certificates upon successful completion.

tasks.task: Understand agricultural extension as a field.
subtasks: Learn about extension education principles.
Distinguish common misconceptions about extension.
Compare extension efforts pre-independence and post-independence.
Explore historical changes in extension methods.
Evaluate contemporary trends like ATMA, cyber extension.
Assess innovations in extension and their impact.
Discuss the role of market-led and privatized extension services.
Analyze rural development concepts.
Examine factors influencing innovation adoption.
Understand the consequences of innovation.
